content: following stripe pattern black x5 white x2 yellow x2 black x4 white x8 black x4 yellow x2 white x2 black x5 leg knit leg in stockinette to desired length heel knit the heel of your choice detailed instructions included below for slip_stitch heel flap and gusset with a square heel turn foot knit to desired length toe alternate decrease row k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm x 2 and non-decrease row 4 4 5 5 times then repeat decrease row only 4 5 5 6 times graft toe closed instructions cuff *see page 1 for instructions on jogless strips if desired hollander using a stretchy cast on i use longtail cast on 56 64 72 80 sts in blue place bor marker and join for working in the round being careful not to twist your sts when using magic loop or dpns i use the placement of the yarn tail as my bor if i m at the start of a needle and the yarn tail is on the right that s the bor knit k2 p2 2x2 ribbing for 5 rounds in blue cut blue and knit 1 round of plain stockinette in red knit k2 p2 for 3 more rounds in red 4 total rounds of red cut red and knit 1 round of plain stockinette in white knit k2 p2 for 15 more rounds in white 16 total rounds of white cut white and knit 1 round of plain stockinette in red knit k2 p2 for 3 more rounds in red 4 total rounds of red cut red and knit 1 round of plain stockinette in blue knit k2 p2 for 4 more rounds in blue 5 total rounds of blue rosanov using a stretchy cast on i use longtail cast on 56 64 72 80 sts in black place bor marker and join for working in the round being careful not to twist your sts to minimize weaving in ends i opted to carry colors if there were fewer than 6 rounds between when they were being used but you can always cut your yarn and restart when it comes up again or you can bravely and chaotically carry your yarn for longer stretches if that s what brings you joy knit k2 p2 2x2 ribbing for 5 rounds in black don t cut black knit 1 round of plain stockinette in white knit k2 p2 for 1 more round in white 2 total rounds of white don t cut white and knit 1 round of plain stockinette in yellow knit k2 p2 for 1 more round in yellow 2 total rounds of yellow cut yellow and knit 1 round of plain stockinette in black knit k2 p2 for 3 more rounds in black 4 total rounds of black cut black and knit 1 round of plain stockinette in white knit k2 p2 for 7 more rounds in white 8 total rounds of white don t cut white and knit 1
